name: phonebooth-api
description: Simple REST API for PhoneBooth notification system.

APP_X_DOMAINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed domains to perform CORS requests.

APP_MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB URI connection scheme. This is for the resources database.

APP_SENTINEL_MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB URI connection scheme to use for Sentinel.

APP_SENTINEL_REDIS_URL.description: Redis URI connection scheme for Sentinel's cache.

APP_BROKER_URL.description: Message broker URI connection scheme for Celery tasks.

APP_RESULT_BACKEND.description: The backend used to store task results (if any).
